mapper.select: SELECT fbtitle FROM freeboard WHERE fbnum=#{param1}
SELECT * FROM qaboard ORDER BY qbnum DESC
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO qaboard(qbnum, qbmid, qbmname, qbemail, qbtitle, qbcontent) VALUES(QABOARD_SEQ.nextval, #{param1}, #{param2}, #{param3}, #{param4} ,#{param5})
mapper.update: UPDATE qaboard SET qbtitle=#{param2}, qbcontent=#{param3} WHERE qbnum=#{param1}
